original: “bhante nāgasena, atthi keci saṅkhārā, ye jāyantī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena atthi keci saṅkhārāḥ ye jāyanti iti
āma mahā rāja atthi saṅkhārāḥ ye jāyanti iti

original: “Cakkhusmiñca kho, mahārāja, sati rūpesu ca cakkhuviññāṇaṁ hoti, cakkhuviññāṇe sati
analyzed: cakkhusmin ca kho mahā rāja sati rūpesu ca cakkhu viññāṇam hoti cakkhu viññāṇe sati

original: cakkhusamphasso hoti, cakkhusamphasse sati vedanā hoti, vedanāya sati taṇhā hoti,
analyzed: cakkhu samphassaḥ hoti cakkhu samphasse sati vedanā hoti vedanāya sati taṇhā hoti

original: taṇhāya sati upādānaṁ hoti, upādāne sati bhavo hoti, bhave sati jāti hoti, jātiyā
analyzed: taṇhāya sati upādānam hoti upādāne sati bhavaḥ hoti bhave sati jāti hoti jātiyā

original: sati jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa
analyzed: sati jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā sambhavanti evam etassa kevalassa

original: Cakkhusmiñca kho, mahārāja, asati rūpesu ca asati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na hoti, cakkhuviññāṇe
analyzed: cakkhusmin ca kho mahā rāja asati rūpesu ca asati cakkhu viññāṇam na hoti cakkhu viññāṇe

original: asati cakkhusamphasso na hoti, cakkhusamphasse asati vedanā na hoti, vedanāya asati
analyzed: asati cakkhu samphassaḥ na hoti cakkhu samphasse asati vedanā na hoti vedanāya asati

original: taṇhā na hoti, taṇhāya asati upādānaṁ na hoti, upādāne asati bhavo na hoti, bhave
analyzed: taṇhā na hoti taṇhāya asati upādānam na hoti upādāne asati bhavaḥ na hoti bhave

original: asati jāti na hoti, jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā na
analyzed: asati na hoti jātiyāḥ asati jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā na

original: honti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti.
analyzed: honti evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti iti
